channel.title: Skola
channel.generator: Webpage HTML Export plugin for Obsidian

item.title: pkt-test2
item.description:
SLAAC
Router(Config)# ipv6 unicast-routing Router(Config)# interface <interface> Router(Config-if)# ipv6 address <ipv6 address>/<prefix> Router(Config-if)# no ipv6 nd ra suppress Router(Config-if)# no shutdown
Stateless
Router(Config)# interface <interface> Router(config-if)#ipv6 nd other-config-flag Router(config-if)#ipv6 dhcp server <pool name> Router(config-if)#exit Router(config)#ipv6 dhcp pool <pool name> Router(config-dhcpv6)#dns-server <dns ipv6 address> Router(config-dhcpv6)#domain-name <domain>
Stateless DHCPv6
Router(Config)# interface <interface> Router(config-if)# ipv6 nd other-config-flag
Stateful DHCPv6
Router(Config)# interface <interface> Router(config-if)# ipv6 nd managed-config-flag

item.title: Packet tracer skills assessment - Part 1
item.description:
Configure hostname
Router(config)# hostname <hostname>
Enable secret password
Router(config)# enable secret <password>
Configure a console password
Router(config)# line console 0 Router(config-line)# password <password> Router(config-line)# login Router(config-line)# exit
Configure remote access to VTY lines
Router(config)# line vty 0 4 Router(config-line)# password <password> Router(config-line)# login Router(config-line)# exit
Configure a Banner MOTD message
Router(config)# banner motd #<message>#
Encrypt all clear-text passwords
Router(config)# service password-encryption
Basic interface configuration
Router(config)#interface <interface> Router(config-if)#ip address <ip address> <mask> Router(config-if)#description <description>

Configure SVI
Switch(config)# interface vlan <SVI number> Switch(config-if)# ip address <ip address> <mask> Switch(config-if)# no shutdown Switch(config-if)# exit
Configure default gateway
Switch(config)# ip default-gateway <ip address>
Configure SSH
Switch(config)# ip domain-name <ip domain name> Switch(config)# crypto key generate rsa How many bits in the modulus [512]: 1024 Switch(config)# username <username> privilege 15 secret <password> Switch(config)# ip ssh version 2 Switch(config)# line vty 0 15 Switch(config-line)# login local Switch(config-line)# transport input ssh Switch(config-line)# exit

Create VLAN
Switch(config)# vlan <vlan number> Switch(config-vlan)# name <vlan name> Switch(config-vlan)# exit
Configure VLAN
Switch(config)# interface vlan <SVI number> Switch(config-if)# ip address <ip address> <mask> Switch(config-if)# no shutdown Switch(config-if)# exit
Assign port to a VLAN
Switch(config)# interface <interface> Switch(config-if)# switchport mode access Switch(config-if)# switchport access vlan <vlan number> Switch(config-if)# exit
Assign multiple ports to a VLAN
Switch(config)# interface range <interface range> # example: interface range f0/7-10 Switch(config-if-range)# switchport mode access Switch(config-if-range)# switchport access vlan <vlan number> Switch(config-if-range)# exit

Configure EtherChannel
Switch(config)#interface range <interface range> # example: interface range f0/7-10 Switch(config-if-range)#channel-group <channel-group number> mode active Switch(config-if-range)#exit
Configure Trunking on EtherChannels
L3-Switch(config)#interface port-channel <channel-group number> L3-Switch(config-if)#switchport mode trunk L3-Switch(config-if)#switchport trunk allowed vlan <vlan number>, etc... L3-Switch(config-if)#exit
Switch(config)#interface port-channel <channel-group number> Switch(config-if)#switchport mode trunk Switch(config-if)#switchport nonegotiate Switch(config-if)#exit
Configure a static trunk uplink
Switch(config)#interface <interface> Switch(config-if)#switchport mode trunk Switch(config-if)#switchport nonegotiate Switch(config-if)#switchport trunk native vlan <vlan number> Switch(config-if)#switchport trunk allowed vlan <vlan number>, etc... Switch(config-if)#exit

Configure inter-VLAN routing on the L3 switch
L3-Switch(config)#ip routing L3-Switch(config)#interface <interface> L3-Switch(config-if)#no switchport L3-Switch(config-if)#ip address <ip address> <mask>
Configure router-on-a-stick inter-VLAN routing on a router
Router(config)#interface <interface> Router(config-if)#no shutdown
+
Router(config)#interface <interface>.<vlan number> Router(config-subif)#description <description> Router(config-subif)#encapsulation dot1q <vlan number> Router(config-subif)#ip address <ip address> <mask> Router(config-subif)#exit
